Q_DESC:
Sort the given set of numbers using Selection Sort. The first line of the input contains the number of elements, the second line of the input contains the numbers to be sorted. In the output print the status of the array at the 3rd iteration and the final sorted array in the given format

Example Input:
8
14 83 25 47 9 77 1 0

Output 1:
0 1 25 47 9 77 83 14 
Sorted Array:0 1 9 14 25 47 77 83

Explanation:
14 83 25 47 9 77 1 0 
0 83 25 47 9 77 1 14 
0 1 25 47 9 77 83 14 
0 1 9 47 25 77 83 14 
0 1 9 14 25 77 83 47 
0 1 9 14 25 77 83 47 
0 1 9 14 25 47 83 77 
0 1 9 14 25 47 77 83 
Sorted Array:0 1 9 14 25 47 77 83 

The Third Iteration: 0 1 25 47 9 77 83 14
